Keywords: Amazon , Teen Titans , Warrior
Real Name: Donna Troy
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
CHAMPION OF THEMYSCIRA: WONDER WOMAN'S BRACELETS: Donna Troy may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped. // If Donna Troy is equipped with WW80 #s005 Wonder Woman's Bracelets, when she is targeted by a range attack increase the result of her Super Senses roll by an additional +1.
THE GROOVY 70'S: Each turn, the first friendly finalized attack roll of 7 is a critical hit.
THE ORIGIN OF WONDER GIRL: Toughness, Super Senses.
